
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to capture the last part of a Windows path.

    Examples
    --------
    > var base = {{alias}}.exec( '\\foo\\bar\\index.js' )[ 1 ]
    'index.js'
    > base = {{alias}}.exec( 'C:\\foo\\bar\\.gitignore' )[ 1 ]
    '.gitignore'
    > base = {{alias}}.exec( 'foo\\file.pdf' )[ 1 ]
    'file.pdf'
    > base = {{alias}}.exec( 'foo\\bar\\file' )[ 1 ]
    'file'
    > base = {{alias}}.exec( 'index.js' )[ 1 ]
    'index.js'
    > base = {{alias}}.exec( '.' )[ 1 ]
    '.'
    > base = {{alias}}.exec( '' )[ 1 ]
    ''

    See Also
    --------
